name: Airport Fever
description:
Manage the airfield and make money in Airport Fever!

Planes have come in to land at your airport—find them a suitable bay to park quickly!

Draw a line from the plane to the parking space and it will start to move. The plane will follow the line that you draw.

Planes need to spend a certain amount of time in a bay to complete their task. Once they're done, they'll vacate the space, ready for the next aircraft!

Be careful! Aircraft should never collide. That will cause damage and cost you a fine.

Act quickly—planes won't wait around for a gate all day. If you don't want their cargo, they'll move on somewhere else.

Make lots of money and unlock new areas! As you unlock more parts of the airfield, different types of aircraft will become available to you. Put each type of aircraft in the appropriate bay.

Once you earn enough money, you can move to the next airport and face a brand new challenge!

Park the planes today in Airport Fever!
